title: Heat suspend Butler; will listen to trade offers
description: The Heat are suspending Jimmy Butler for seven games for "conduct detrimental to the team" and said they will listen to trade offers.

title: Sources: Dodgers, Hyeseong Kim agree to deal
description: The Dodgers are in agreement with Korean infielder Hyeseong Kim on a three-year, $12.5 million contract, sources confirmed.
author: Jesse Rogers

title: Fact or Fiction: The Phoenix Suns have nowhere to go but up
description: With the NBA's most expensive roster, Phoenix is 15-17 outside the Western Conference's playoff picture. Is there any hope in the Valley of the Sun?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Seahawks prank rookie Byron Murphy II with fake $156K dinner receipt
description: The meal was still more expensive than some people's salaries.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Salah wants 'special' Premier League win in 'last year' at Liverpool
description: Mohamed Salah insists he is determined to end on a high at Liverpool and win the Premier League in what he suggests is his final season at the club.

title: Littler sets up World Championship final showdown with MVG
description: Luke Littler demolished Stephen Bunting 6-1 to set up a World Darts Championship final against Michael van Gerwen at Alexandra Palace on Friday, live on Sky.

title: 'Like a cat toying with a mouse' - but Littler's victory was far from inevitable
description: Why Luke Littler's historic world title win at Ally Pally felt 'inevitable', even if it wasn't.

title: Teenager Littler demolishes Van Gerwen to claim historic world title
description: Luke Littler makes history at Alexandra Palace with victory over Michael van Gerwen in PDC World Darts Championship final.
